parametrized_description: The company produces two types of candy packs: peach and cherry. Each pack of peach candy requires PeachFlavoringPerPack units of peach flavoring and SpecialSyrupPerPackPeach units of special syrup. Each pack of cherry candy requires CherryFlavoringPerPack units of cherry flavoring and SpecialSyrupPerPackCherry units of special syrup. The company has AvailablePeachFlavoring units of peach flavoring and AvailableCherryFlavoring units of cherry flavoring available. The number of peach candy packs produced must be greater than the number of cherry candy packs, and at least MinimumCherryPercentage fraction of the total packs must be cherry flavored. The objective is to determine the number of each type of pack to minimize the total amount of special syrup used.

PeachFlavoringPerPack.description: Units of peach flavoring required per pack of peach candy

CherryFlavoringPerPack.description: Units of cherry flavoring required per pack of cherry candy

SpecialSyrupPerPackPeach.description: Units of special syrup required per pack of peach candy

SpecialSyrupPerPackCherry.description: Units of special syrup required per pack of cherry candy

MinimumCherryPercentage.description: Minimum fraction of packs that must be cherry flavored

NumberOfPeachPacks.description: The number of peach packs to produce

NumberOfCherryPacks.description: The number of cherry packs to produce

constraints.description: The total peach flavoring used (PeachFlavoringPerPack * number of peach packs) must not exceed AvailablePeachFlavoring.
The total cherry flavoring used (CherryFlavoringPerPack * number of cherry packs) must not exceed AvailableCherryFlavoring.
The number of peach candy packs produced must be greater than the number of cherry candy packs produced.
At least MinimumCherryPercentage fraction of the total candy packs produced must be cherry flavored.

objective.description: Minimize the total amount of special syrup used, which is calculated as (SpecialSyrupPerPackPeach * number of peach packs) + (SpecialSyrupPerPackCherry * number of cherry packs).
